action.description: From committee: Amend, and do pass as amended.Declared an emergency measure under the Constitution.Read third time. Amended. (Amend. No. 973.)Dispensed with reprinting.Read third time. Passed, as amended. Title approved, as amended. (Yeas: 26, Nays: 15, Not voting: 1.)To printer.From printer. To reengrossment. Reengrossed. Second reprint.To Senate.In Senate.
